OOC( I think it's a great idea to meet up.  But I can't leave to go 
anywhere with my work schedule.  But we could find a site where we 
can post pictures of ourselves and let the members of the group see 
us that way. What do you think?)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
>  I was just looking at stuff, and I realized that our club has 
> reached some milestones. I think is the first club I've ever been 
too 
> where a new post is put in every 30 seconds, which is great for 
> member imput. We are the friendliest, cheeriest bunch around. We're 
> not greedy or anything about winning, it's just Transformer Fun. I 
> just wanna say thanks for making me a part of this.
> 
> Anyway, our club is turning a whole year old. Also, we're coming up 
> to the 10,000th message since using egroupes. And since that was 
only 
> a few months ago, it's a great feet. So what I was thinking was 
that 
> we should do somethimg to get together. You know, have everyone 
meet 
> at the chatroom and talk about transformer stuff. It'd be great! 
Tell 
> me what you think about it.
